entry.content:

I finished the ice cave, bought everything from that town, and got
the Ultimate Key. I went right to the Pirate Cove and I am
exploring it. I feel like I will be getting Red soon, which is
rad.

I got to the cave in the winter area and I'm looking for the guy

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (16)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (16)20171130
I fought evil Jessica after getting to the top of the tour and
then getting the jewels. The story is developing in quite a fun
way and I'm glad to have her back. I'm getting a bit anxious
though... it starting to feel too samey.

Total time: 25:33
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (15)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (15)20171129
I beat Dhoulmagus and then found Jessica. The fight with him was
really tense and hard. For a while, I thought I was supposed to
lose the fight. It was pretty cool. I really enjoyed it. I am
annoyed that I lost Jessica though.

Total time: 23:47
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (14)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (14)20171128
I got the mirror repaired and charged, then I went into the Dark
Ruins. I'm still exploring there now. It was really fun to see
Medea as a real girl. The story is so cute! I get the feeling I am
about to see the twist in the story where the real ancient evil is
revealed.

Total time: 22:05
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 1 - The North Remembers (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 1 - The North Remembers (4)20171127
This is such an intense way to get back to the show... so many
things have started that it was hard to appreciate the first
time. I love how snide Tyrion is when he comes back. Cersei's
conversation with Littlefinger is epic. Stannis and Melisandre
make a great opening. Daenerys just seems so beaten down. I'm
very excited for Jon to meet Ygritte!
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Movie: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones, directed by George Lucas (2002) (3)
entry.content:
Movie: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones, directed by George Lucas (2002) (3)20171126
The kids decided that they wanted to watch this today after
church. It was pretty fun. I only half paid attention. Natalie
Portman looks so good. I'm kind of amazed that Padme was not more
disgusted Anakin killing all the sand people. There are a few
things that won't be great about the Machete viewing order with
this one because you won't know that Anakin is from Tatooine or
that he knew Padme before, but otherwise it is a pretty strong
opening to the past chapters.
  • Movies
  • 2002

entry.title: Book: The Dragonet Prophecy, by Tui T. Sutherland (2012) (2)
entry.content:
Book: The Dragonet Prophecy, by Tui T. Sutherland (2012) (2)20171124
I finished this today. It was okay. It is so clearly written for a
young kid that doesn't have the patience to see a lot of
development. Very "tell" and not "show". I was surprised at how
bloody it was though.
  • Books
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (10)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (10)20171123
I got the ship and started to go towards the Western
continent. When I was younger, I loved the freedom of getting
ships/etc in games, because I would explore all over the
place. Nowadays, it frustrates me because I feel like there's a
bunch of random stuff that I should get to be the best at the
game, but it is frustratingly all over the place in weird
corners. Then, of course, you can't really go everywhere at this
point in the game, so there's all sorts of islands/continents with
too-high-cliffs that you can't get on to. I just want to move on
and play the game more but it's not obvious where to go.

Total time: 14:47
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017
